name: cash
description: liquid assets. the lifeblood of any operation.

name: dirty money
description: money that feels slightly wet. needs laundering before it's useful.

name: clean money
description: taxed and usable. no questions asked.

name: cred
description: reputation gate for crew and activities. respect in the underworld.

name: heat
description: police attention. too much and someone goes down.

name: notoriety
description: how well known you are in the underworld. opens doors, draws eyes.

name: scraps
description: salvaged materials. useful for repairs and trades.

name: rations
description: food and water. keeps the crew moving.

name: fuel
description: gasoline and diesel. powers vehicles and generators.

name: tools
description: basic hand tools. essential for any job.

name: stolen goods
description: hot merchandise. needs a fence to move.

name: contraband
description: illegal items with no paper trail. worth more to the right buyer.

name: weapons
description: firearms and blades. muscle needs tools.

name: vehicles
description: cars and trucks. getaway rides and supply runs.

name: turf
description: controlled territory. passive income and protection.

name: product
description: finished drugs ready to sell. pure profit.

name: precursors
description: chemical ingredients. the building blocks of product.

name: lab equipment
description: beakers, burners, and condensers. cook cleaner, cook faster.

name: stash
description: hidden storage capacity. keeps product safe from raids.

name: fake IDs
description: forged identification. new names, new lives.

name: counterfeits
description: fake bills and goods. pass them before they're checked.

name: marks
description: identified targets. suckers lined up and ready.

name: props
description: costumes and disguises. look the part, play the part.

name: blackmail
description: compromising material. leverage over the powerful.

name: favors
description: political IOUs. call them in when needed.

name: insider info
description: tips from the inside. know before anyone else.

name: influence
description: pull with officials. make problems disappear.

name: hardware
description: computers and devices. the tools of digital crime.

name: data
description: stolen records. names, numbers, secrets.

name: exploits
description: software vulnerabilities. keys to locked doors.

name: crypto
description: digital currency. untraceable wealth.

name: bandwidth
description: network capacity. more connections, more ops.

name: artifacts
description: objects of power. handle with extreme care.

name: ritual components
description: candles, bones, and stranger things. fuel for the dark arts.

name: forbidden knowledge
description: things man was not meant to know. power at a price.

name: souls
description: currency of the damned. trade carefully.

name: corruption
description: spiritual taint. grows with each dark act.
